content.new:
I cloned and built latest version of vrx and ran it with “roslaunch vrx\_gazebo navigation\_task.launch”

Gazebo showed the world with ocean reflection well, but published wrong image for each camera topics.

My Gazebo is latest version\(9.11.0\) and previous version of vrx publishes camera image normally in same environment.

‌

previous version :

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/2979576510-previous_ver.png)
‌

latest version :

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/2510761269-update_ver.png)
‌
